original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): Sri Lanka Cricket elections to elect the office bearers for the 2023–2025 period, will be held on Saturday (May 20), at the 62nd Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Sri Lanka Cricket in Colombo.
SLC elections conducted by the SLC Elections Committee will start at 10:00 AM.
Incumbent President Shammi Silva, Jayantha Dharmadasa, and Samantha Dodanwala have submitted nominations to the post of SLC President.
Incumbent Secretary Mohan de Silva, Roshan Iddamalgoda, Samantha Dodanwala, and Naleen Aponsu have submitted nominations to the post of Secretary.
Govt. to notify AG Dept. on decision regarding X-Press Pearl case on 1st June
Minister Sabry summons Canadian HC on alleged genocide claims by Canadian PM
Prednisolone eye drops from India to be blacklisted in Sri Lanka
